page.title: 08Ecology in Alresford
page.content: The land in and around Alresford is well supplied with footpaths and areas where people can just sit and enjoy the scenery. The villagers are helpful and keen when it comes to maintaining and developing public rights of way and nature facilities. Pollution comes in various forms, the carbon monoxide from exhaust fumes is on the increase as there is a greater number of cars around. Another problem is the sand and gravel lorries which drive past the orchards and leave a fine layer of dust on the crop of apples.
